entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
PATCHY FOG
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
